title: Port Value IR model to Go
description:
Port Morphir.IR.Value.Value from Elm to Go stable IR.

## Overview
Implement the Value IR model in pkg/models/stable/ir/value.go following existing patterns from Type and Pattern.

## Value variants to implement
- Literal, Constructor, Tuple, List, Record, Variable, Reference, Field, FieldFunction
- Apply, Lambda, LetDefinition, LetRecursion, Destructure, IfThenElse, PatternMatch, UpdateRecord, Unit

## Upstream references
- src/Morphir/IR/Value.elm
- src/Morphir/IR/Value/Codec.elm (v2/v3)
- src/Morphir/IR/Value/CodecV1.elm (v1)

## Subtasks
- [ ] Create value.go with Value[TA, VA] interface and all variant structs
- [ ] Implement constructors for each variant
- [ ] Add structural equality helper (EqualValue)
- [ ] Add attribute mapping helper (MapValueAttributes)
- [ ] Create value.go JSON codec (EncodeValue/DecodeValue)
- [ ] Support v1 snake_case and v2/v3 PascalCase tags
- [ ] Add roundtrip tests for v3
- [ ] Add tag assertion tests (v1 vs v3)
- [ ] Add wrong-version decode rejection tests
close_reason: Completed implementation of Value IR model and JSON codec with full test coverage

title: Sync GitHub Actions workflows with just recipes
description:
Our GitHub Actions CI workflows are not using our just recipes, which makes it harder to test CI locally. We should refactor the workflows to use just commands so that:

1. Developers can run `just ci-check` locally and get the same results as CI
2. There's a single source of truth for build/test/lint commands
3. Workflow maintenance is simplified - changes to build logic only need to happen in the Justfile

## Current State
- CI workflows define their own commands inline
- `Justfile` has `ci-check`, `lint`, `test`, `fmt`, etc. recipes
- The two are not always in sync

## Desired State
- CI workflows call `just` commands instead of inline scripts
- Local `just ci-check` produces equivalent results to CI
- All build logic lives in the Justfile

## Tasks
- [ ] Audit current CI workflow commands vs just recipes
- [ ] Update CI workflows to use just recipes
- [ ] Verify CI passes with the new approach
- [ ] Document the change in README
